Description:
Teams continues to innovate across communication, collaboration, and workplace - with AI at the heart of that innovation. Learn about the latest features in Channels, Chat, External collaboration, Meetings, Events, Rooms, and more. Across all new features, Teams is focused on making customer and admin experiences that are simple, smart, and secure.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
